author: scohen
msg: Deprecate FTPClient.listFiles() methods that take a FTPFileListParser param
For those FTPClient.listFiles() methods that do not take a FTPFileListParser
param, reimplement as per previous FTPClient.getFileList() methods
Change ParserInitializationException to inherit from RuntimeException
Add FTPFileEntryParserFactory member to FTPClient and initialize this
member to a new DefaultFTPFileEntryParserFactory.  Add a set() method
for this member.  Remove logic that attempts to initialize this member

author: dfs
msg: Changed dependency from oro 2.0.7 to 2.0.8 since the newer version contains bug fixes.

author: scohen
msg: Added more documentation for the new APIs added to FTPClient, in relation

author: scohen
msg: Enhance FTPClient.getFileList by implementing autodetection.  A null parserKey param causes autodetection of parser type.
